title: No. IRS imponation
subtitle: Contacts claim to be staff members of the Fraud Division of the Internal Tax Service and inform victims that they owe tax funds that must be paid immediately to avoid arrest or other criminal penalties.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Contacts claim to be staff members of the Fraud Division of the Internal Tax Service and inform victims that they owe tax funds that must be paid immediately to avoid arrest or other criminal penalties.
